amendment.description: To provide for emergency assistance to the people of Liberia, with offsets.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1807 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1807 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Chafee. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12713-12715; text as modified: CR 10/17/2003 S12713) To provide for emergency assistance to the people of Liberia, with offsets.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1807 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1807 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Chafee.
